name: GateControl: Focus
description: 3D webVR audio experience which lets you control the sound depending on your mood. There are 3 VR rooms: Calm, Positive Energy, Focus. Written and Created by Katarzyna Zioła under the eye od dr hab. Ireneusz Kuriata in Identity and Audiovisual Graphics Studio @ Academy of Fine Arts in Szczecin, Graphic Design Departament.
